import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import ModalVideo from 'react-modal-video'; const CoursesDetailsSidebar = () => { // Popup Video const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = React.useState(true); const openModal = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); } return ( {/* If you want to change the video need to update videoID */} setIsOpen(!isOpen)} />
{e.preventDefault(); openModal()}} className="link-btn popup-youtube" >
